name: Compressed Multimedia Fusion File
summary: Learn about .CCN files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: CCN files are similar to .MFA files, but are compressed and do not contain edition information.

description: Development file generated by Multimedia Fusion (MMF), a game creation program; typically generated from sub-application objects within an application; referenced by MMF when building the final game application.
